header.title: CosFileTransfer_VirtualFileSystem

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosFileTransfer::VirtualFileSystem interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosFileTransfer/include/*.hrl").

func.name: '_get_file_system_type'(VFS) -> Return
func.fsummary: Return the target object's associated file system

desc.p: This read only attribute represents the target object's associated file system.

func.name: '_get_supported_content_types'(VFS) -> Return
func.fsummary: Return the target object's supported content types.

desc.p: This read only attribute represents the target object's supported content types.

func.name: login(VFS, User, Password, Account) -> Return
func.fsummary: Create a new instance of a FileTransferSessionand a Directory

desc.p: This operation creates a new instance of a FileTransferSession and a Directory. The later represents the current working directory of the returned FileTransferSession.
